0: What a fantastic Hotel great location great rooms value for money fantastic staff
Great location for visiting leicester and birmingham
The parking area is located in front of the hotel grounds and easy access
My 6 year old loved the VIP badge and godie bag with the instructions to collect sweets from various hotel locations the best hotel ever his words
Location is excellent with good access to motorways and the city ring road
The location of this hotel is perfect if you are travelling around
Attended a meeting in one of their rooms attentive staff on arrival gave precise details of room location
1: the hotel is located in a business part nothing around
2: Location is not at all exciting unles you like retails parks and roads
Took a while for the congierge to locate my meeting room but otherwise polite professional service
We used the park and ride bus into the city there is a bus stop just past the pub one block along
It is a great location however for a conference some of the key equipment needed week not working correctly which delayed the start

If the location was a bit better it would be perfect
Unfortunately there ’s no bus service at the hotel and a 5minute walk is required which also takes you to the shopping area on Fosse Park
Would stay again but is on the pricey side for the location
Parking easy and reasonable although I question the parking charge of £ 6 per day bearing in mind the hotel is located 4 miles out of town
